articles.description: FORT LAUDERDALE — Matthew Tkachuk is not expected to play for the Florida Panthers on Saturday against visiting Seattle due to a lower-body injury, coach Paul Maurice confirmed Friday. Tkachuk was hurt playing for Team USA at the NHL’s 4 Nations Face-Off. He …
articles.content:
FORT LAUDERDALE Matthew Tkachuk is not expected to play for the Florida Panthers on Saturday against visiting Seattle due to a lower-body injury, coach Paul Maurice confirmed Friday.
